titles: Pluto furens & vinctus, or, The raging devil bound a modern farse / Per Philocomicum.
author: Carr, William.
Fitton, Alexander, Sir, d. 1699.
notes: Perhaps written with assistance of Sir Alexander Fitton; for discussion of authorship, see H.G. Platt in Modern language notes, XLV (1930), p. 507-510.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Macclesfield, Charles Gerard, --  Earl of, 1618?-1694 --  Caricatures and cartoons.
